sentences.english: Consider whether you want the background in focus or nice and blurry.
sentences.chinese: 然後考慮景深深淺讓背景聚焦清晰或模糊虛化。

sentences.english: The viewfinder image will darken when the previewAE lock button is pressed.
sentences.chinese: 當按壓預景深自動曝光鎖定按鈕時，取景器相將變暗。

sentences.english: Focus is key in successful macro photography, in which a shallow depth of field is inherent.
sentences.chinese: 聚焦是微距攝影成功的關鍵，其中的淺景深是內在的。

sentences.english: That's the setting you need for the shallow DOF effect you're looking for.
sentences.chinese: 這是能使你得到淺景深效果的參數。

sentences.english: The shallow depth of field as well as the natural framing focuses the eyes on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 淺景深同樣能作爲自然的相框，讓眼睛關注拍攝主體。

sentences.english: That's a shallow DOF. Great portraiture often uses a shallow DOF to isolate the subject.
sentences.chinese: 一幅精彩的肖像畫經常運用淺景深來突出主題。

sentences.english: Depth of field – cutscenes: option only affects cutscenes and dialogue sequences, does not affect gameplay performance.
sentences.chinese: 過場動畫景深，不影響遊戲過程中的性能。

sentences.english: Use Shallow Depth-of-Field Isolate a centerpiece or other main subject with a shallow depth of field.
sentences.chinese: 使用淺景深能分離餐桌擺飾和其它主體。

sentences.english: The depth of the landscape is delineated by mysterious flairs of white, the powdery blue snow embankment.
sentences.chinese: 詭祕的白色與飄灑的藍色雪粉建構了景深。

sentences.english: Having a shallow DOF in this case is good.
sentences.chinese: 這時候淺景深正是我們所需要的。

sentences.english: Preset depth-of-field carried the day to help me capture the scene at the top of this column.
sentences.chinese: 景深的設計幫助我在柱狀物的頂部拍攝了這張照片。

sentences.english: A high -gloss coating can achieve a high DOI with more material.
sentences.chinese: 高光澤飾面和高塗布量可以產生高‘景深’。

sentences.english: This new lens has vivid color, wide aperture, small depth of field.
sentences.chinese: 新的標頭，顏色鮮豔，大光圈，淺景深，很不錯。

definition: contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
camera (abbr. for 照相機|照相机[zhao4 xiang4 ji1])/at the opportune moment/as the circumstances allow
